test_description: Verify Salla OAuth 2.0 State Parameter Validation to prevent CSRF
business_risk: Critical - Account takeover or rogue tenant association
preconditions: User logged in; Salla App configured; Mock Salla Auth Server running
test_steps: 1. Initiate OAuth flow; 2. Intercept callback request; 3. Tamper with 'state' parameter; 4. Submit modified callback to backend
expected_result: Backend rejects request with 403/400 error; No tokens exchanged; Security alert logged
test_data_needs: Valid user session; Mocked OAuth codes
success_criteria: State mismatch always results in rejection

business_risk: High - Stale analytics lead to poor merchant decisions
preconditions: Webhook listener active; QStash configured; CDC worker running
test_steps: 1. Simulate 'order.created' webhook; 2. Verify OLTP (Postgres) upsert; 3. Monitor QStash queue; 4. Poll ClickHouse SalesFact table
expected_result: Data appears in ClickHouse within 5 minutes with exact field matching

test_description: Verify Multi-Tenant Isolation in Vector Search (RAG)
preconditions: pgvector populated with data from Merchant A and Merchant B
test_steps: 1. Authenticate as Merchant A; 2. Send query relevant to Merchant B's data; 3. Inspect vector search results
expected_result: Vector search returns ZERO results from Merchant B; Only Merchant A context retrieved
test_data_needs: Seeded vector embeddings for multiple tenants
success_criteria: Strict merchant_id filtering in SQL/Vector query
